text: We need such memories. So we ask you to go back there on a great plan we have. 'Go back?' gasped Flor. 'Yes. We plan to attack the Heavy World. You must help to lead our force. The afternoon of eternity wore on, that golden road of an afternoon that would somewhere lead to everlasting night _ We neeol such mecnes- So vse @sk You ko {0 back O grea} Aan wQ haue_ 6o back?
